name: Bururu @Ignister
desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "@Ignister" monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY as a material for a Cyberse Synchro Monster: You can target 1 monster in your GY that was used as material for this Summon, except "Bururu @Ignister"; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Bururu @Ignister" once per turn.
